code: import React from'react';import'./Skills.css';import{FaCode,FaServer,FaDatabase,FaTools}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Skills=()=>{const skillCategories=[{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCode,{}),title:'Programming Languages',skills:['Python','Java','JavaScript','Dart','PHP']},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaServer,{}),title:'Frameworks & Libraries',skills:['Node.js','React.js','Express.js','Flutter','Pandas','NumPy','Seaborn','Scikit-Learn']},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaDatabase,{}),title:'Databases & Tools',skills:['MongoDB','Firebase','Git','GitHub','Vscode','Android Studio','Power BI','MySQL']},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTools,{}),title:'Soft Skills',skills:['Problem Solving','Analytical Thinking','Time Management']}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",className:"skills section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Skills & Expertise"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-grid",children:skillCategories.map((category,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-category",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-icon",children:category.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"category-title",children:category.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-list",children:category.skills.map((skill,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"skill-item",children:skill},idx))})]},index))})]})});};export default Skills;
